channel.title: TextHandler.java
channel.description: My source (Bluecore v2) doesn't have this file so i can't make teleporting emote buttons. What should i do?

item.title: TextHandler.java
item.dc:creator: @Scyrnn Scyrnn
item.description:
@Scyrnn wrote:

If you don’t know how to work my Project Bluecore v2 then you should seriously jump off a cliff, its based off dodian and its so easy to code. Good luck lol…

Read full topic

item.title: TextHandler.java
item.dc:creator: @Full_Metalst Full Metalst
item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

bigh51:

Make it?

Teach him how…like this:

If you don’t have a TextHandler.java, here’s mine you could put it in yours I guess:

[code]
import java.io.*;

public class TextHandler { //My First Handler…

/*

public TextHandler()
{
	//Nothing needs to be put in here
}
